1338650.name: Alice | 愛莉澄【Demo】
1338650.description:
FREE DEMO version is no longer available on April 14, 2022

Alice(愛莉澄) is a Japanese survival horror game. This game aims to escape from the construction site at night.

ーーSeveral months ago, A decomposed body of the woman called "Alice（愛莉澄）" who worked in a sex trade shop was discovered In the construction spot.
Since then, the figure of the woman that the skin discolored came to be witnessed in the construction spot in the night.
When you are a way back from the mountaineering club, because of the bike was flat , you have to go through the construction spot.
Can you come back home safely...?

Play time is assumed to be about 0.5 ~ 1 hour.

Control
Walk：WASD
Night vision：E
Viewpoint：Mouse
Crouch：Ctrl
Jump：Space
Run：Shift
Use/Get Items：Q
Menu：Esc
